meanings.sent1: The inordinateness of candy in the jar was tempting.
meanings.sent2: The inordinateness of his laughter filled the room with joy.
meanings.sent3: The inordinateness of presents under the tree made the children's eyes sparkle.
meanings.sent4: The inordinateness of her love for animals knew no bounds.
meanings.sent5: The inordinateness of the colors in the painting was mesmerizing.

meanings.sent1: His inordinateness in eating cake led to a stomachache.
meanings.sent2: The inordinateness of her excitement was contagious.
meanings.sent3: The inordinateness of his jokes always made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The inordinateness of her shopping sprees drained her bank account.
meanings.sent5: The inordinateness of his energy was unmatched by anyone else.
